r.d: PHP extension for reading Rar archives using bundled unRAR library.
r.n: - Upgraded bundled UnRar to version 3.7.8. - Updated source code to use new parameter parsing API. - Fixed PECL bug #9002 (rar_list invalidates rar resource) - Fixed PECL bug #11430 (rar_extract() doesn't close handles gracefully) - rar_open() now throws an error when failed to open the specified file.
